successes.title: Arist: Brews Coffee Like The Best Baristas Anytime Anywhere
successes.description: The Arist coffee machine brews coffee like the world's best baristas at the tap of a smartphone.

Pledges.description: A huge personal thank you on our website.
An awesome Arist t-shirt and your name immortalized on our website.
Our awesome Arist t-shirt and a beautiful poster of all the components in Arist as well as your name engraved in our websites HTML.
Our Coffee Bean Starter kit, including 30 kinds of coffee beans (30g each) and 30 kinds of individual packaged syrups (2 capsules each). And our awesome Arist t-shirt.
Get Arist for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $299.  Pre-order price will be $349
Early-Bird $299 reward has sold out. Thanks to backers' support.
Get Arist for the Kickstarter Pre-order price at $349.
Get Arist and Coffee Bean Starter kit for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $374.
Early-Bird $374 reward has sold out. Thanks to backers' support.
Get Arist and Coffee Bean Starter kit for the Kickstarter price of $424.
Base on feedback, The wooden design of Arist is a HIT! We want to create a lower price point of this reward just for the machine!  This is Arist Kickstarter special edition!
You can check out all design at http://www.aristcafe.com/#gallery
2 machines bundle! Get 2x Arist for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $583.

Get Arist Kickstarter special edition (Wooden outlook) and Coffee Bean Starter kit for the early-backer Kickstarter price of $599, awesome Arist t-shirt, Arist poster. This version will only be on Kickstarter!
